pastPos.title: Software Development Engineer Intern
contents: Worked on the Alexa Smart Home Mobile GUI using React Native, and Native Android & iOS
Implemented Smart Home devices group's & category's entities controls such as power, brightness, color, locks, & temperature
Feature is expected to bring customer's coverage from 75% to 99% by adding new capabilities to over 1.4 million costumers.

pastPos.title: Software Engineer Intern
contents: Intelligent Cloud Services (ICS) builds applications for the next generation of Integration Platform as a Service. The ICS team helps thousands of businesses integrate the power of big data into their industry.
Migrated several front end features from native JQuery (Internal Framework) to React.
This migration resulted in rendering time improving from 2,000 ms to 100 ms.
Migrated the Data Synchronization Services from a Java based (backend) rendering to a React UI based rendering.
Contributed several key features for Informatica's new React based framework

pastPos.title: Undergraduate Researcher
contents: Worked under a grad student on planarization of non planar graphing algorithms and graphing optimization for microfluidics
Implementing bug fixes and contributing several graph routing algorithms based on 2D space efficiency.

pastPos.title: Software Engineer Intern
contents: Implemented a conversion tool for backwards compatibility between Ziiâ€™s IFE tablets and contributed content distribution APIs
The conversion tool to fully blend a +1 terabytes content set from 16 hrs to 1hr by using multi-threading and OS optimization.
Worked on the content distribution team and contributed several distribution functionality using Google Protobufs.
Tool is currently in production on Lufthansa, All Nippon Airways, and Fly Dubai with over +150 planes flying
